info.name: Top Casino in Mayfair London, UK Les Ambassadeurs Casino
features: Private members club with over 100 years of tradition
Boasting one of the most sophisticated gaming rooms in the world
Dress code may be smart, but the venue calls for the best attires
Offering the finest European and Asian cuisines
Including a smoking garden with gaming amenities

descriptions.mainDescription: Located in the very heart of Mayfair, Les Ambassadeurs Casino offers one of the most luxurious gaming floors in London. Blending tradition in one of the most exclusive Georgian properties with the modern sophistication of the best casinos in the whole world. Extending its flawless quality tradition for over 100 years.
descriptions.secondDescription: Members of this private club may enjoy classic casino games such as roulette, baccarat, three card poker and blackjack. Just as well as Les Ambassadeurs’ restaurant with European, Middle Eastern, Chinese, and Indian cuisines, each presented to perfection through a variety of delectable dishes.

info.name: Top Stylish Casino in Manchester, UK Manchester235
features: Vegas-style casino
Signature restaurant & bar
Live shows entertainment available
Hiring packages for special events available
Perfectly located in a Manchester landmark venue

descriptions.mainDescription: If you are looking for a Vegas-style casino, the Manchester 235 is your venue of choice. Ideally located in the landmark Great Northern Warehouse of Manchester city, where you can play Roulette, Poker, Blackjack, slot machines and more, surrounded by its stylish atmosphere.
descriptions.secondDescription: Boasting one of the top venues in town and the UK, not only for prime gaming, but also for food and drink with its signature bars and restaurant. Not to mention Manchester235's monthly themed nights and special events that completes this venue with a comprehensive offer for your entertainment experience.

info.name: Top Established Casino in London, UK Grosvenor Casino The Victoria
features: Lively and vibrant atmosphere for a night out
Including classic casino tables and electronic games
Restaurant and bar serve tasty dishes and modern drinks
Regular live entertainment available
Ideally located in the heart of London town

descriptions.mainDescription: The Grosvenor Victoria is one of London's favorite casinos. Renowned as "The Vic", this distinguished venue offers a blend of classic gaming with modern style right in the heart of the capital city. Including the classic gaming tables everyone adores and a wide range of electronic slots and live tables for your entertainment.
descriptions.secondDescription: First-timers may enjoy a free welcoming spin on its colorful roulette table and a fresh cocktail on behalf of the Vic. Its restaurant offers a diverse menu to savour, and stirs a selection of beverages at the bar, and main sporting events are screened across the casino all year long. Definitely worth visiting when in London town.

Whether you are an expert punter or an amateur, everybody is welcome at Napoleons Casino to enjoy the amenities this opulent venue has to offer.
descriptions.secondDescription: Napoleons expert chefs offer a unique fusion of much-loved classics, succulent grills, and tempting international dishes, for those looking for a fine restaurant option. And guests can enjoy local gins and more drinks at its late bar to get along through their gaming experience, or just to relax with their close ones.

descriptions.mainDescription: Genting Casino in the coastal city of Bournemouth offers a nice range of entertainment, with a complete selection of games, a restaurant and bar, and special events, including gaming tournaments and food & drink specials. Whether you're travelling to Bournemouth for the summer beach season or you prefer the town when it's quieter, this casino is available all year round.

Or if you fancy a neat place to have a drink or a tasty snack, it is the perfect venue to spend with reasonable prices.

Dive into its stylish amenities, or just relax and sip a drink at its stylish signature bar.
